valueProofs.heading: What every engagement includes
valueProofs.description: Every Cloud MLM Software engagement ships with procurement-ready deliverables, global readiness validation, and advisor partnership.

items.title: Procurement-ready deliverables
items.detail: Line-item pricing, acceptance criteria, and legal-ready documentation packaged for approvals.

items.title: Global readiness
items.detail: Multi-market, currency, and tax scenarios validated before you commit a signature.

items.title: Advisor partnership
items.detail: Compensation scientists and automation engineers shape every estimate alongside your team.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Straight answers to the questions procurement, finance, and legal teams ask most often.

items.question: Is the licence a recurring subscription?
items.answer: Cloud MLM Software pricing is a one-time licence. You own the platform. Optional managed services, infrastructure, or extended concierge packages can be renewed annually as needed.

items.question: Can we phase markets and product launches?
items.answer: Yes. Every engagement includes a phased launch roadmap with scenario modelling so you can unlock markets, products, or segments when your leadership is ready.

items.question: How quickly do we receive an investment brief?
items.answer: After you share an estimator scenario, a pricing advisor prepares a procurement-ready brief with milestones, payment cadence, and assumptions within one business day.

items.question: Do you integrate with our existing systems?
items.answer: Integrations are core. We bring accelerators for commerce, payments, tax, ERP, and CRM, and design bespoke middleware for enterprise data requirements.
